bots.name: CNN
bots.author: CNN
bots.description: Recommends news stories that became personalized over time as it learns your interests.

bots.author: WSJ
bots.description: WSJ Messenger brings you breaking business news, investigative reporting and markets coverage from the award-winning WSJ newsroom.

bots.name: Poncho
bots.author: Poncho
bots.description: Personalized weather forecasts that will make you smile whatever the weather.

bots.name: 1-800-Flowers
bots.author: 1-800 Flowers
bots.description: Order flowers from Messenger.

bots.name: Sequel Stories
bots.author: Sequel
bots.description: Choose your own adventure and discover romance, comedy, horror, and mystery!

bots.name: HP Print Bot
bots.author: HP
bots.description: The HP Print Bot allows users to easily print content directly from a Facebook Messenger conversation.

bots.name: Operator
bots.author: Operator
bots.description: Operator is the easiest way to shop! Send us a text and our experts provide personalized recommendationsâ€”for free!

bots.name: Assist
bots.author: Assist
bots.description: No more searching, no need for an entire app. Assist brings the best services to your favorite messaging apps.

bots.name: Sure
bots.author: Sure
bots.description: Say 'Hi' on Facebook Messenger and instantly find businesses that match your values.

bots.name: Miss Piggy
bots.author: the Muppets
bots.description: Talk to Miss Piggy from the Muppets on Facebook Messenger!

bots.name: Zork
bots.author: Zork
bots.description: Zork is one of the earliest interactive fiction computer games now on Facebook Messenger!

bots.name: Detective Kees
bots.author: Sequel
bots.description: Assist Detective Kees in solving murders as part of the Criminal Investigation Unit. Message and start chatting!

bots.name: Hudson
bots.author: Hudson
bots.description: Start the day with an update from Hudson... news, weather, and a video for the commute.

bots.name: MemeMaker
bots.author: Harrison Shoebridge
bots.description: Create awesome macros on the fly, all you need is a picture and a line of text.

bots.name: JARVIS on Messenger
bots.author: Swapnil Agarwal
bots.description: Just A Rather Very Intelligent System, now on Messenger! JARVIS is a community-driven bot that aims to be as simple as possible to serve humans with their everyday tasks.

bots.name: Marina Alterra
bots.author: Alterra
bots.description: Marina Alterra is a virtual AI travel agent, a messenger bot (powered by algorithms, not humans). It helps travelers to discover where to go on vacation and book hotels there.

bots.name: Wally
bots.author: Mobile Media LLC
bots.description: Wally helps you get the most points from the credit cards you already have, and get the ones you need, to travel like a boss.

bots.name: Start A Fire
bots.author: Start A Fire
bots.description: Start A Fire help users get value from the links they share. Offering badges that go alongside user content and unique recommendation systems that ensure the content that goes viral is brand-worthy. The tool enables those who share content to get the full value of that shared content.

bots.name: 20Bot
bots.author: 20 Minutes
bots.description: Brings to you top stories, breaking news, etc. on demande. Also send top stories every day at 1pm. It can also reply to some custom request.

bots.name: DropBot
bots.author: Emmanuel Crouvisier
bots.description: DropBot gets you the best prices on the things you want by letting you know when to buy.

bots.name: Botsify
bots.author: Usama Noman
bots.description: Botsify helps you create facebook messenger chatbot for your business/page without any coding.

bots.name: My Playlist Finder
bots.author: Matt Shirlaw
bots.description: My Playlist Finder is an intelligent messenger bot that uses your personal preferences to find and recommend awesome playlists. Take the hassle out of finding new music and let My Playlist Finder change your day!
